org.apache.velocity.runtime.log
Interface LogChute

All Known Implementing Classes:
AvalonLogChute, AvalonLogSystem, JdkLogChute, Log4JLogChute, Log4JLogSystem, LogChuteSystem, NullLogChute, NullLogSystem, PrimordialLogSystem, SystemLogChute
public interface LogChute

Base interface that logging systems need to implement. This is the blessed descendant of the old LogSystem interface.

Version:
$Id: LogChute.java 494611 2007-01-09 21:57:20Z henning $
Author:
Jon S. Stevens, Geir Magnusson Jr., Nathan Bubna
